titles.title: Capital for Beginning Farmers and Ranchers Act of 2024
Capital for Beginning Farmers and Ranchers Act of 2024

A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to provide for a pilot program under which development loans and loan guarantees may be made to beginning farmers and ranchers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.
